attributes.action: Offer statatory free skills training to all people let down by our education system !!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was let down badly by the "Great British Education System" now I find I work for a minimum wage job, as do millions of us, therefore cannot able to afford the costs of training for real skills, that lead to a comfortable living, do we have to put our selves through 6 months of unemployement to access these kinds of services, I think not.
